hadiths.text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by Ibn ‘Umar to the same effect through a different chain of narrators. This version has the additional words:If he is not fasting, he should eat, and if he is fasting, he should leave it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي إِجَابَةِ الدَّعْوَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been reported about accepting invitations
